summary: Nike is an American company that makes athletic shoes, clothes, and sports gear. It's the biggest supplier of these products worldwide and brings in over $46 billion in sales each year. Founded in 1964 as Blue Ribbon Sports, it became Nike in 1971, named after the Greek goddess of victory. Nike sells many popular brands like Air Jordan, Converse, and Nike Skateboarding. It also sponsors famous athletes and teams. With over 83,000 employees, Nike is one of the most valuable sports brands, worth more than $32 billion.
title: Nike, Inc.
